errors.noMetamaskAccess: 메타마스크의 계정에 대한 액세스 권한을 부여하지 않았습니다. 거래하기 위해 서명이 요청됩니다. 계속하려면 사인을 클릭하십시오.

errors.wrongNetwork: 잘못된 네트워크를 선택했습니다. 메타 마스크에서 {{ networkToChoose }}를 선택하십시오.
errors.OverQueryLimit: 당신은 시간의 짧은 기간에 너무 많은 거래를 실행하려고했습니다. 당신은 여전히 문제가있는 경우, 기다려 나중에 다시 시도하시기
errors.userReject: 트랜잭션 실행을 거부했습니다. 거래를 완료하기 위해 먼저 확인하십시오.
errors.rubicError: 나중에 다시 시도하거나 다른 장치를 사용해 보십시오. 여전히 문제가 있는 경우
errors.insufficientFunds: {{ tokenSymbol }} 이 (가) 충분하지 않습니다. 잔액은 {{balance}} {{tokenSymbol}}, 이지만 {{requiredBalance}} {{tokenSymbol}} 이 (가) 필요합니다.
errors.insufficientFunds1inch: 이체 및 가스 수수료에 대한 {{ nativeToken }} 의 양이 충분하지 않습니다. 거래의 경우 더 적은 금액을 입력하거나 {{ nativeToken }} 잔액을 충전하십시오.
errors.walletlinkWrongNetwork: Coinbase 애플리케이션에서 {{ networkToChoose }} 네트워크가 선택되어 있는지 확인하십시오. 코인베이스 애플리케이션에서 네트워크를 변경하려면 하단 패널의 설정으로 이동하여 "Active Network" 탭을 선택합니다.
errors.wrongToken: 루빅 브릿지는 루빅 토큰 만 지원합니다.
errors.notSupportedNetwork: {{networkToChoose}} 선택한 지갑 제공 업체에서 지원하지 않습니다.

errors.lowGas: 거래 가스가 너무 낮습니다. 최소한의 거래 비용을 충당하기에는 가스가 충분하지 않습니다. 공급 가스를 늘리십시오

aboutPage.description: Rubic은 완전한 원스톱 분산화 플랫폼을 제공하는 것을 목표로 하는 크로스 체인, P2P, 즉시 스왑 및 지정가 주문을 여러 블록체인에 제공하는 멀티체인 DeFi 생태계입니다.

0.title: Custom routing
0.description: Rubic created a routing solution that will allow users to trade any token. The main advantage is the ability to calculate gas prices and show users the best-optimized solution with paying the least amount of gas.

1.title: Instant Trade
1.description: Execute an instant trade using external DEXs (while getting best rates).

2.title: Multichain support
2.description: Currently supported blockchains: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon & TRON).

3.title: Cross-chain swaps
3.description: Complete swaps between these networks: BSC <-> Ethereum, Polygon <-> Ethereum, Ethereum -> TRON and BSC -> TRON.

4.title: Faucet
4.description: Our Faucet feature will allow users to buy tokens using RBC or ETH without KYC. Currently, users are able to buy BNB, but more to come!

5.title: P2P 거래
5.description: 거래를 생성하고, 자신만의 조건을 선택하고, 공개 또는 비공개로 하는 것 모두 분산된 방식으로 수행됩니다.

6.title: Limit Order
6.description: Set the desired rate and your deal will be executed automatically when one of the DEXs meets the parameters of your deal.

data.3: 멀티 체인: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon & TRON networks
data.5: Percentage of platform revenue can be regulated
data.11: 사기 및 러그 풀이 발생하지 않도록 방지

data: Cross-chain Solutions For ETH And BSC
Creating BRBC And Building Rubic Bridge For RBC-BRBC
CoinGecko And Coin Market Cap API For ETH<>RBC
New Wallets support - Wallet Connect + WalletLink (Coinbase)
New Blockchain/Bridge Integrations (Candidates: Anyswap/XDai, HECO, Moonbeam, Fantom, Avalanche, RenBTC)
Rubic Cross-Chain 2.0 development begins, improving stability and decentralization
Creating a 24/7 technical support team for our community
Beginning of a new blockchain integration
Rubic Relay Widget partners and integrations

Three new blockchains integrated (Compatible with Rubic Cross-Chain) Candidates: Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Cosmos (ATOM), Polkadot (DOT), Kusama (KSM), Fantom (FTM), Elrond (EGLD), Enjin (ENJ), Pulse chain (ticker PLS), Optimism, Arbitrum
Yield Farming and/or Lending Product integrations
3-6 new blockchain integrations (Compatible with Rubic Cross-Chain)

0.title: How To Contact Support?
0.answer: If you need assistance, feel free to contact our support team here by submitting a ticket on our website or on our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot Live chat - Contact Rubic team for immediate assistance using chat. Available 24/7. Email Support - support@rubic.finance. Message Rubic Support anytime with more complex or technical questions. We're here to help.

1.title: What is the Rubic Relay widget and how can we integrate it?
1.answer: The Rubic Relay is a great solution for the problems projects face regarding low user turnover. It keeps users on your website, transforming trades into a simple action: the Relay offers users and project owners the function of buying and selling tokens on their own project’s webpage, leading users to stay on your website for longer out of sheer utility. The Relay is also scalable across different devices, and it’s possible to change the colours and size of the Relay widget itself as well. Here is a detailed instructional guide for the Relay’s integration: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ULxjzN3sVc2indb5-_PtR7v7jui_tCJ7/view?usp=sharing

2.title: Why does my Instant Trade swap have a long-lasting “Pending” status?
2.answer: Reason: It’s possible that the gas fee that was set is not enough to process your transaction. How to solve: If the transaction is “Pending”, it is best to accelerate the transaction manually, by changing to the desired value of gas, in order to force the completion of the transaction. It can be done via your wallet. You will be able to pay an additional gas fee. If you still need assistance, feel free to contact our support team hereby submitting a ticket or on Telegram https://t.me/RubicSupportBot

3.title: Why do I get the “Insufficient Balance” error?
3.answer:
If you swap a native token and you encounter this error it means that you are trying to send all of your transferable funds out, without leaving enough balance for the transaction fees. If you transfer a non-native token, a value exceeding the available balance has been entered in the “Amount” field. 
Also, please check that you have connected the proper wallet and you have enough tokens for the swap.
The fee is shown on the transfer screen before you confirm the transfer. Deduct this amount from the total amount you're sending out, and your transfer will go through.

4.title: What should I do if I get the “Price Impact Too High” error?
4.answer:
Reason:
 This error is caused by low liquidity.

Try trading a smaller amount, or increase slippage tolerance via the settings icon and try again. If that did not help, then the token’s liquidity is too low to swap.

5.title: What if my transaction has a “Dropped & Replaced” status?
5.answer:
Dropped & Replaced" means the transaction has been replaced by a new one.

 There are two possible reasons for that status:
1. You have accelerated the transaction in your wallet and will receive the desired tokens, you can find out information about the transaction in the “Replaced by Txn Hash" tab.
2. You probably cancelled the transaction by mistake. The assets will not be debited from your address, but the gas fee will not be refunded back to you.

6.title: Why did I get the ”Expired” status
6.answer:
The transaction was not mined in the time period allotted for it.

In this scenario, the transaction should be sent again. Note that during the transaction, the gas spent on its execution is burned, but not completely. A gas fee is also charged for conducting the re-sent transaction.

7.title: Why do I get “Warning! Error Encountered During Contract Execution [Out of Gas]”?
7.answer:
Reason:
 There was not enough gas for the transaction.

 This scanner error means the gas limit you set was above the minimum but still not sufficient to get the transaction to execute. Please try again with a higher gas limit. Also, we recommend not to change the gas limit manually, your wallet will set the needed amount automatically.

8.title: Why do I have a long-lasting “Pending” status of a Multi-Chain transaction?
8.answer: Presumably, gas prices increased dramatically during that time. If the above methods did not help, please contact our support team via chat on the website or Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

9.title: How can I solve the “Execution Reverted: Pancake: K” error?
9.answer:
Reason:
 This usually happens when you are trying to swap a token with its taxes included. 

 How to solve:
 To fix the “Pancake: K” error, you need to change slippage. Also, you can try to change the number of tokens that you are trying to swap. 
Let’s say that you’re trying to swap 10000 Token A for BNB. To fix this, you need to change the last number of Token A. For example, instead of inputting “10000”, change it to “10001”.
 You can also try to decrease the number of tokens you are trying to swap.

10.title: What can I do with the “Error: Transaction Gas Too Low”?
10.answer: Reason: Temporal malfunction of the RPC used in the wallet for the chosen network. If this error occurs, the transaction has not been sent and the money will not be debited from your wallet. How to solve: Due to the temporal malfunction of the RPC used in the wallet for the chosen network, it can rectify itself over time. You can also try to resend the transaction or just wait a while. If if you have tried 2 to 3 times and nothing helps, there is another solution to try: change the RPC to the relevant one, you can find out how to do it and which RPC is relevant at the current moment in time in the support chat on the website, or in our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

11.title: Why do I get the Error: “INSUFFICIENT_OUTPUT_AMOUNT”?
11.answer:
Reason:
 You're trying to swap tokens, but your slippage % tolerance or liquidity is too low.

 How to solve:
 1. Try trading a smaller amount at one time.
 2. Increase your slippage % tolerance.
 3. Lastly, try inputting an amount with fewer decimal places or remove the decimals, if at all possible.

12.title: How to solve the “TransferHelper: TRANSFER_FROM_FAILED” (On PancakeSwap) error?
12.answer:
1. Check to make sure you have sufficient funds available.
 2. Ensure you have given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to trade with.
3. Change the last digit in the entered amount to "1".

13.title: What can I do if I get the “TRANSFER_FAILED” error?
13.answer:
Make sure you have 30% more tokens in your wallet than you intend to trade, or try to trade a lower amount. If you want to sell the maximum possible, try 70% or 69% instead of 100%.
Another possible cause of this issue is the malicious token issuer just suspended the trading of their token. That, or they made the action of selling only possible for selected wallet addresses. Please always do your own research to avoid any potential fraud. If the token you are trying to swap fails with this error code, it is likely coming from an airdrop that is most likely a scam. Please do not perform any token approvals or follow any links, otherwise your funds may be at risk if you try to do so.

14.title: What can I do if I get “Execution Reverted: TransferHelper: TRANSFER_FROM_FAILED”?
14.answer: Reason: This error happens when trading tokens with insufficient allowance (in case you have changed the approved amount manually upon signing in the wallet), or when a wallet has insufficient funds. How to solve: Check to make sure you have sufficient funds available. Ensure you have given the contract allowance to spend the amount of funds you're attempting to trade with. If the above methods do not help, please contact our support team via chat on the website or our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot.

15.title: Why do I get “Transfer Amount Exceeds Allowance”?
15.answer: Reason: This happens when you set a limit on your spending allowance when you first approve the contract, then you try to swap more than that limit. Please contact our support team via chat on the website or our Telegram: https://t.me/RubicSupportBot We will advise you on the steps to take to resolve the problem.

16.title: Why do I get the “BEP20/ERC20: Transfer Amount Exceeds Balance” error?
16.answer:
Reason:
 Your balance is insufficient.

 There is a possibility that the operation of receiving this token succeeded but the data about it was not updated on the website.
Please, clear the cookies on the website and reload the page. Also, check that you have enough tokens to process the transaction.

17.title: Why do I get “Internal JSON-RPC Error. { "code": -32000, "message": "insufficient funds for transfer" } - Please Try Again.”?
17.answer:
Reason:
 You don't have enough native tokens to pay for the transaction fees. Please, check that you have enough tokens to pay fees.

18.title: What can I do if I get `Swap Failed: Error: [ethjs-query] While Formatting Outputs From RPC '{"value":{"code":-32603,"data":{"code":-32603,"message":"handle request error"}}}'?

19.title: Method Execution Error: Error: Internal JSON-RPC error. { "code": -32000, "message": "header not found"}

20.title: What if I have an “Insufficient funds” error?
20.answer:
Reason:
There is not enough native token for the gas fee + transaction.

How to solve:
If you swap a native token and you encounter this error, it means that you are trying to send all of your transferable funds out, without leaving enough balance for the transaction fees. If you transfer a non-native token, a value exceeding the available balance has been entered in the “Amount” field. 
Also, please check that you’ve connected the proper wallet and you have enough tokens for the swap.
The fee is shown on the transfer screen before you confirm the transfer. Deduct this amount from the total amount you're sending out, and your transfer will execute properly.

1.label: CRYPTOLOVE
1.description: 저희 플랫폼에서 첫 번째 멀티체인 스왑을 완료하고 가스 캐쉬백을 받으세요!

2.label: Avalanche 가스 요금 환불
2.description: Avalanche 네트워크에서 Rubic Multi-Chain 라우팅 출시를 축하하기 위해 우리 프로젝트는 새로운 Gas Refund Campaign을 시작합니다! 10월 19일부터 11월 2일까지 사용자는 좋아하는 토큰을 사용하여 스왑을 완료할 수 있습니다. Rubic Multi-Chain Routing을 사용하여 Avalanche 네트워크에서 GAS 환불을 받으세요.

progress.label: 가스 환불 진행 중

instantTrades.slippage: 가격이 입력 된 비율 이상으로 불리하게 변경되면 거래가 취소됩니다. (낮은 비율은 트랜잭션이 전면 실행될 가능성을 줄입니다.)

reason.4000: 프로모션 코드는 이미 사용된 적이 있습니다. 이 프로모션 코드는 한 번만 사용할 수 있습니다.

wrong.text: 프로모션 코드가 잘못 입력되었거나 존재하지 않습니다.

banner.defaultText: Rubic Multi-Chain이 출시되었습니다! Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Avalanche, MoonRiver 및 Fantom 에서 10,000개의 토큰을 교환하십시오.
banner.customText: Fantom는 이제 멀티체인 및 온체인 스왑에 사용할 수 있습니다.
